Description: Creates base year synthetic firms by NAICS and number of jobs
Creates future year synthetic firms by NAICS and number of jobs
Creates households with number of persons by age group
Assigns number of workers by age group to households
Assigns household lifecycle category
Predict total household income
Predict household housing (single-family, multifamily, group quarters) and place each household in a Bzone
Allocate number of jobs by Bzone and type (total, retail, service) & assign jobsite Bzone to workers and create worker table
Assign development type to household (urban, rural)
Calculate Bzone density, diversity, design, and accessibility measures
Assign urban mixed use attribute to households
Calculates transit revenue miles per capita for region and Bzone transit service level
Calculates regional per capita lane-miles for freeways and for arterials
Models roadway speeds, delay, and congestion costs
Assign number of vehicles owned by household
Identifies household use of car services and adjusts vehicle ownership. Autonomous vehicle deployment.
Assigns vehicle type (auto, light truck) to each household vehicle
Creates vehicle table and populates with household and vehicle IDs, geography, and vehicle type
Assign age to each household vehicle
Assigns powertrain type (ICE, HEV, PHEV, EV) to each household vehicle
Calculates household DVMT on household vehicles and carshare vehicles
Calculates household walk trips, bike trips, and transit trips
Calculates proportional reduction of DVMT based on user-established goals for shifting short-range SOV tours to bike or similar "slow" modes
Determines how household DVMT is split between household vehicles
Assigns household DVMT to household vehicles
Determines proportions of DVMT of each vehicle powered by stored electricity vs. on-board hydrocarbon fuel
Calculate light-duty commercial service vehicle DVMT
Calculate heavy-duty vehicle DVMT
Calculates public transit DVMT by type
Assign light-duty vehicle age, powertrain, and fuel type characteristics
Assign heavy-duty vehicle age, powertrain, and fuel type characteristics
Assign public transit vehicle age, powertrain, and fuel type characteristics
Input light duty vehicle characteristics by model year, vehicle type, and powertrain
Input heavy duty vehicle characteristics by model year, vehicle type, and powertrain
Adjust vehicle fuel economy to account for congestion and eco-driving
Calculate household vehicle energy consumption by type (hydrocarbon fuel, electricity)
Calculate household vehicle emissions
Calculate commercial LDV, HDV, and PT emissions
Input unit cost assumptions for vehicle travel, energy, emissions, etc.
Identifies which households have pay-as-you-drive insurance
Calculates household costs for owning and operating vehicles
Calculates roadway costs and revenues and additional taxes to balance
